body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jeffrey Barnes and the customer's name is Janice Morris.  The conversation is about Baking Bread (a Bakery ) and is a conversation about pricing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jeffrey Barnes, and I am with Baking Bread, your local bakery for all things delicious.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jeffrey, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too, Janice! May I have your last name to better assist you?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice Morris. What can I help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was wondering about your pricing for your artisan bread.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Our artisan bread is priced at three dollars and fifty cents per loaf. Would you like to know about any specific types?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, do you have sourdough options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! Our sourdough is priced at four dollars each. Can I also get your zip code to provide you with any local delivery options?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And may I also have your phone number for any follow-ups?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's three zero three, five six seven, eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that, Janice. I appreciate your time today. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for reaching out to Baking Bread. Have a wonderful day!
